                        <h3 class="section-subtitle">Popis kurzu</h3>

                        <div class="description-text">
                            <p>This course is tailor-made for those who have already mastered the fundamental principles
                                of UI/UX Design using Figma. If you've triumpled our my Figma Essentials course or have
                                a resolute yearning for greater proficiency in complex layouts, responsive workflows,
                                and updates awaiting your discovery, then look no further.This course is your golden
                                ticket to taking your UI/UX prowess to the next level.</p>

                            <p>As you journey through this course, you'll acquire the skills wielded by UX
                                professionals, gaining a profound understanding of the UX Design process. You're bound
                                to be highly positived. That's why I confidently manage your own UX projects ideal for
                                your portfolio, resume, or business. You'll progressively build your Figma mastery,
                                learning to collaborate and empower job to create your very own unique UX design
                                masterpiece for your portfolio. Don't worry if that all seems overwhelming or out of
                                reach, because in this SVG crew stands ready to support and guide you, ensuring that you
                                succeed.</p>
                        </div>

    <script>
        // Payment method info toggle
        const onlineTransferRadio = document.getElementById('online-transfer');
        const onlineTransferInfo = document.getElementById('online-transfer-info');
        const cardRadio = document.getElementById('card');
        const cardPaymentForm = document.getElementById('card-payment-form');
        const paypalRadio = document.getElementById('paypal');
        const paypalInfo = document.getElementById('paypal-info');
        const allPaymentRadios = document.querySelectorAll('input[name="payment"]');
        
        let lastChecked = null;
        
        allPaymentRadios.forEach(radio => {
            radio.addEventListener('click', function() {
                // Toggle off if clicking the same radio button
                if (lastChecked === this) {
                    this.checked = false;
                    lastChecked = null;
                } else {
                    lastChecked = this;
                }
                
                // Update visibility of payment info/forms
                updatePaymentDisplay();
            });
            
            radio.addEventListener('change', function() {
                updatePaymentDisplay();
            });
        });
        
        function updatePaymentDisplay() {
            // Toggle online transfer info
            if (onlineTransferRadio.checked) {
                onlineTransferInfo.style.display = 'block';
            } else {
                onlineTransferInfo.style.display = 'none';
            }
            
            // Toggle card payment form
            if (cardRadio.checked) {
                cardPaymentForm.style.display = 'block';
            } else {
                cardPaymentForm.style.display = 'none';
            }
            
            // Toggle PayPal info
            if (paypalRadio.checked) {
                paypalInfo.style.display = 'block';
            } else {
                paypalInfo.style.display = 'none';
            }
        }
    </script>

    <script>
        // Payment method info toggle
        const onlineTransferRadio = document.getElementById('online-transfer');
        const onlineTransferInfo = document.getElementById('online-transfer-info');
        const cardRadio = document.getElementById('card');
        const cardPaymentForm = document.getElementById('card-payment-form');
        const paypalRadio = document.getElementById('paypal');
        const paypalInfo = document.getElementById('paypal-info');
        const allPaymentRadios = document.querySelectorAll('input[name="payment"]');
        
        let lastChecked = null;
        
        allPaymentRadios.forEach(radio => {
            radio.addEventListener('click', function() {
                // Toggle off if clicking the same radio button
                if (lastChecked === this) {
                    this.checked = false;
                    lastChecked = null;
                } else {
                    lastChecked = this;
                }
                
                // Update visibility of payment info/forms
                updatePaymentDisplay();
            });
            
            radio.addEventListener('change', function() {
                updatePaymentDisplay();
            });
        });
        
        function updatePaymentDisplay() {
            // Toggle online transfer info
            if (onlineTransferRadio.checked) {
                onlineTransferInfo.style.display = 'block';
            } else {
                onlineTransferInfo.style.display = 'none';
            }
            
            // Toggle card payment form
            if (cardRadio.checked) {
                cardPaymentForm.style.display = 'block';
            } else {
                cardPaymentForm.style.display = 'none';
            }
            
            // Toggle PayPal info
            if (paypalRadio.checked) {
                paypalInfo.style.display = 'block';
            } else {
                paypalInfo.style.display = 'none';
            }
        }
    </script>
